lore: Driven by vindictive obsession, Morgana is a potent mistress of suffering and the black arts. Once a being of grace and light, she was ripped from her kind during an ancient conflict that broke her soul, turning her into the cruel tormentor she is today. Comforted by a prophecy that claims she will strike the final blow and gain her revenge, Morgana lies in wait, her lust for power growing endlessly.
title: Fallen Angel
blurb: Driven by vindictive obsession, Morgana is a potent mistress of suffering and the black arts. Once a being of grace and light, she was ripped from her kind during an ancient conflict that broke her soul, turning her into the cruel tormentor she is today...
allytips: Shrewd use of Black Shield can determine the outcome of team fights.
Items that provide survivability allow Morgana to become extremely difficult to kill in conjunction with Black Shield and Soul Shackles.
Tormented Soil is an excellent farming tool if you're by yourself in a lane.

passive.name: Soul Siphon
passive.description: Morgana heals for the spell damage she deals to champions, large minions, and large monsters.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Morgana heals for the spell damage she deals to champions, large minions, and large monsters.

enemytips: Tormented Soil deals tons of damage to units missing large amounts of Health. When low on Health, be wary of Morgana's attempts to trap you within its reach.
Morgana often needs to land Dark Binding to setup her other attacks. Use your minions as shields against Dark Binding.
name: Morgana

spells.name: Dark Binding
spells.description: Morgana releases a sphere of dark magic. Upon contact with an enemy unit, the sphere will deal magic damage and force the unit to the ground for a period of time.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Morgana releases a sphere of dark magic. Upon contact with an enemy unit, the sphere will deal magic damage and force the unit to the ground for a period of time.
spells.tooltip: Fires a bolt of dark energy, rooting the first enemy hit for {{ e2 }} seconds and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Fires a bolt of dark energy, rooting the first enemy hit for {{ e2 }} seconds and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Tormented Soil
spells.description: Infects an area with desecrated soil, causing enemy units who stand on the location to take continual damage.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Infects an area with desecrated soil, causing enemy units who stand on the location to take continual damage.
spells.tooltip:
Curses an area for {{ e7 }} seconds. Enemies on the cursed ground are dealt
from {{ e5 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage every second based on the enemy's missing Health.

Every time Soul Siphon heals Morgana, Tormented Soil's cooldown is reduced by {{ e4 }}%.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Curses an area for {{ e7 }} seconds. Enemies on the cursed ground are dealt from {{ e5 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage every second based on the enemy's missing Health. Every time Soul Siphon heals Morgana, Tormented Soil's cooldown is reduced by {{ e4 }}%.

spells.name: Black Shield
spells.description: Places a protective barrier around an allied champion, absorbing magical damage and disables until penetrated or the shield dissipates.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Places a protective barrier around an allied champion, absorbing magical damage and disables until penetrated or the shield dissipates.
spells.tooltip: Shields an allied Champion for {{ e2 }} seconds. The shield absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and prevents disables until it breaks.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Shields an allied Champion for {{ e2 }} seconds. The shield absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and prevents disables until it breaks.

spells.name: Soul Shackles
spells.description: Latches chains of energy onto nearby enemy champions, dealing initial damage to them and slowing their Movement Speed, and then echoing the pain a few seconds later and stunning them if they remain close to Morgana.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Latches chains of energy onto nearby enemy champions, dealing initial damage to them and slowing their Movement Speed, and then echoing the pain a few seconds later and stunning them if they remain close to Morgana.
spells.tooltip:
Dark chains latch onto nearby enemy Champions dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing them by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds, granting True Sight. After {{ e3 }} seconds, they are dealt an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are stunned for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Enemy Champions can break the chains by moving away from Morgana.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Dark chains latch onto nearby enemy Champions dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing them by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds, granting True Sight. After {{ e3 }} seconds, they are dealt an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are stunned for {{ e2 }} seconds. Enemy Champions can break the chains by moving away from Morgana.
